name: Rock Painting Story (itch)
description:
Rock Painting Story is an action-adventure game that wins the grand prize of russian indiedev forum (Hellroom) jam.

The game is pretty short (~15min to complete) because competition had only two weeks for development.

Features:

  • The graphic style of cave paintings from the Stone Age.
  • The story told without words. Pure emotions and music.
  • The atmosphere of loneliness and antiquity.
  • Hunt and fend off wild animals.
  • Mammoth. In an unusual role.
  • Some puzzles.
  • Battles with the enemy tribe.

Have fun!
